name: The Fool
description: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life
love: The start of a new romance, but it may be set on superficial, shallow means. A young, exciting love.

name: The Magician
love: All the tools are there to make the relationship work. You and your partner will use all you have at your disposal. Pay attention to other cards for the outcome.

name: The High Priestess
love: Listen to your gut feeling about this relationship. If it feels right, you will feel spirtually fulfilled. If it seems wrong, don't ignore it.
